content.question: After moving a distance <math alttext="x sub 1" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi>x</mi> <mn>1</mn> </msub> </math>, what is the speed of the block?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 6 A over m, end root, times x sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac></msqrt><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction A over 2 m, end root, times x sub 1, end sub, squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><msup><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction 2 A over m, end root, times x sub 1, end sub, squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac></msqrt><msup><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction A over 4 m, end fraction, times x sub 1, end sub, to the 4 power" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac><msup><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mn>4</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction A over 2 m, end root, times x sub 1, end sub, squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><msup><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
